title: Mailing colorectal cancer screening kit found effective, regardless of financial incentive

title_detail.value: Mailing colorectal cancer screening kit found effective, regardless of financial incentive

summary: Roughly a quarter of patients overdue for colorectal cancer screening mailed completed kits back within two months, even if they weren't given any kind of financial incentive.

summary_detail.value: Roughly a quarter of patients overdue for colorectal cancer screening mailed completed kits back within two months, even if they weren't given any kind of financial incentive.
